title: E-commerce API Documentation
description: Dynamic E-Commerce Workflow Management. The system features dynamic routes for order processing, real-time inventory updates, and secure user authentication. Documented Backend API published publicly using Postman.

title: Course Booking API Documentation
description: RESTful API for managing course enrollments, featuring user registration, authentication, and course lifecycle. Publicly documented using Postman.
